content:
# The stone furnace has been successfully crafted, and I now have 1 stone furnace in my inventory, along with 5 stones and 10 iron ores remaining.
# Now that I have the stone furnace, I will attempt to place it at the stone patch position (-14.5, -14.5) again.

# Attempting to place the stone furnace at the stone patch position.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(-14.5, -14.5))  # Placing the stone furnace at the stone patch. 
print(f'Furnace placement result: {furnace.position}')  # Confirming the placement of the furnace.
